archimate:Grouping.name: Salesforce Applications (App Exchange)
archimate:Grouping.documentation:
Salesforce AppExchange is Salesforce.com's cloud computing marketplace through which end users can access, download and install software apps.
AppExchange offers a mix of free and paid apps organized into collections, categories and industry solutions that encompass a variety of fields.
* [Salesforce AppExchange](https://appexchange.salesforce.com/)
